amendment.description: Amendment increases funds in the Higher Education account by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase the Higher Education account by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 65 (Roll no. 297).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Adams amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 358 - 65 (Roll no. 297).
